extension.name: Email Activation
extension.author: Piotr Gasiorowski
extension.description: To prevent dummy emails with this plugin every time users change their email address in profile, they will be required to activate it by using a link from activation email.

field.name: groups
field.description: Users of selected groups will not be required to proof their new email. No email will be sent.
field.label: Do not require activation from:

field.name: redirect_url
field.description: Redirect to URL after new email has been activated
field.label: Redirect after activation

field.name: exec
field.description:
Code to be executed after succesfull activation
Variables in scope: array $user, string $oldEmail, string $email
field.label: Execute on succesfull activation

field.name: block
field.description:
User account will be blocked by the time they activate new email.
Attention: Disabling this option after it was enabled will make pending activations impossible.
May cause issues if an user types in his email wrongly
field.label: Block user account after change

field.name: logout
field.description:
Users will be forced to log out after they change their email.
Attention: No message will be shown!
May cause issues if an user types in his email wrongly
field.label: Force user to logout after change
